info.title: How to use:
info.autoFetch: Tap the "Refetch" button to get your location
info.offline: Works offline (requires online for first visit)
info.moreHelp: For more details and FAQ, click here

offline.title: How Offline Mode Works
offline.pwa: This app is a PWA (Progressive Web App). All files are cached on your device during the first visit, allowing offline use thereafter.
offline.cache: HTML, CSS, JavaScript files are cached by Service Worker on first visit
offline.data: JCC/JCG/SOTA data files are stored locally and searchable offline
offline.gps: GPS (geolocation) is a hardware feature of your smartphone, so it works without internet connection

accuracy.title: Location Accuracy
accuracy.gpsLimits: GPS accuracy typically has an error of 5-10 meters. Accuracy may decrease due to the following factors:
accuracy.obstacles: GPS signals may be blocked by obstacles such as buildings, mountains, or trees, reducing accuracy
accuracy.agps: A-GPS (network-assisted) is unavailable offline, which may increase initial location acquisition time
accuracy.estimation: JCC/JCG/SOTA are estimated using nearest neighbor search from local data

data.title: Data Accuracy
data.region: This app supports Japan only. JCC/JCG/SOTA data are all for Japan.
data.jccJcg: Calculated from representative coordinates of each municipality (e.g., city hall). Near municipal boundaries, adjacent municipalities' JCC/JCG may be displayed.
data.sota: Uses summit data from the official SOTA database for Japan (4,600 summits). Displays the nearest summits (top 3) in order of distance.
data.elevation: Online: Accurate elevation from Japan GSI API. Offline: Displays 'Unavailable'.
data.address: Online: Accurate address from OpenStreetMap API. Offline: Estimated from local data with '(Estimated)' label.

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.noLocation: Check your browser and device location settings. On iPhone, check Settings → Privacy & Security → Location Services → Safari.
troubleshooting.slow: You may be in an area with weak GPS signals (indoors, mountain valleys, etc.). Try in an open outdoor area. Offline mode may take longer.
troubleshooting.wrongData: GPS accuracy limits (5-10m error) or you may be near municipal boundaries. Moving a few meters may show correct values.
